alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:37PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western St. Bernard, south central Orleans, northeastern Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 415 PM CDT... At 337 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Belle Chasse. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Harvey, Chalmette, Gretna, Violet, Terrytown, Poydras and Meraux. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
